title: Correction to: Comparing planktonic heliozoan abundance in deep and shallow basins of Lake Biwa: exploring optimal growth temperature, food resources and habitat use
content: This is a correction to: Junya Yoshida, Soumya Deb, Shin-ichi Nakano, Comparing planktonic heliozoan abundance in deep and shallow basins of Lake Biwa: exploring optimal growth temperature, food resources and habitat use, Journal of Plankton Research, 2024, fbad062, https://doi.org/10.1093/plankt/fbad062
siteTitle: Journal of Plankton Research Current Issue
